entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
